00020 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00021     DEFINES TO FORCE LINKER TO KEEP TESTCLASS CODE
00022     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00023 #ifdef APOXI_TARGETSYSTEM_HOST
00024     #define SYMBOL_DECORATOR_START() /include:?c_test_data_
00025     #define APPEND_TO_SYMBOL_NAME(className) className
00026     #ifdef REGISTER_UNITTESTSUITE   
00027         #define SYMBOL_DECORATOR_END @@3VUnitTestSuiteData@@B
00028     #else
00029         #define SYMBOL_DECORATOR_END @@3VUnitTestData@@B
00030     #endif
00031     #define ASSEMBLE_DECORATOR(decorator) QUOTE_DECORATOR(decorator)
00032     #define QUOTE_DECORATOR(decorator) #decorator
00033     #define INCLUDE_SYMBOL(className) comment (linker, ASSEMBLE_DECORATOR(SYMBOL_DECORATOR_START()APPEND_TO_SYMBOL_NAME(className)SYMBOL_DECORATOR_END))
00034     #define END_INCLUDE_SYMBOL comment( user, "")
00035 #else
00036     #ifdef APOXI_COMPILER_C166 
00037         // Using the pragmas no_global_dead_store_elim and global_dead_store_elim. Tasking Compiler doesnot perform preprocessor macro substituions for pragmas.
00038         // Thus, pragmas are directly added to UnitTestRegistrar.hpp
00039         #define INCLUDE_SYMBOL(className) 
00040     #endif 
00041     #ifdef APOXI_COMPILER_RVCT
00042         // Use the -keep linker command line option to prevent linker from optimizing out (wrongly detected) unused code
00043         #define INCLUDE_SYMBOL(className) 
00044     #endif
00045     #ifdef APOXI_COMPILER_ADS
00046         // Use the -keep linker command line option to prevent linker from optimizing out (wrongly detected) unused code
00047         #define INCLUDE_SYMBOL(className)
00048     #endif
00049 #endif // APOXI_TARGETSYSTEM_HOST
